Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together, during the Los Angeles Lakers' season opener against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Tuesday.
Others: Ken Griffey Sr. and Ken Griffey Jr. were courtside at the Lakers' downtown arena to witness the same history they made in Major League Baseball.
LeBron showed no signs of slowing down and averaged more than 25 points per game last year for his 20th consecutive season.
Bronny survived cardiac arrest and open heart surgery in the summer of 2023 and went on to play a truncated freshman season at the University of Southern California.
